mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND ( #{category} IS NULL OR category = #{category} )

SELECT notice_num noticeNum, notice_writer noticeWriter, notice_category noticeCategory, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeCotent, notice_create_date noticeCreateDate, notice_update_date noticeUpdateDate, notice_count noticeCount FROM notice WHERE noticeTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND( #{category} IS NULL OR category = #{category} ) ORDER BY noticeNum DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT notice_num noticeNum, notice_writer noticeWriter, notice_category noticeCategory, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeCotent, notice_create_date noticeCreateDate, notice_update_date noticeUpdateDate, notice_count noticeCount FROM notice WHERE notice_num = ${noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( notice_writer, notice_category, notice_title, notice_content, notice_create_date, notice_update_date, notice_count, ) VALUES( #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, updatedDate = NOW() WHERE noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
